document.discussion_title: Wedbush Reaffirms Hold Rating for Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD)
document.topic_text: Tweet Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) ‘s stock had its “hold” rating reissued by investment analysts at Wedbush in a research note issued on Monday, AnalystRatings.Net reports. Advanced Micro Devices ( NASDAQ:AMD ) traded down 12.53% during trading on Monday, reaching $3.49. 64,226,688 shares of the company’s stock traded hands. The stock has a 50-day moving average price of $2.72 and a 200 day moving average price of $2.33. Advanced Micro Devices has a 1-year low of $1.61 and a 1-year high of $3.99. The stock’s market capitalization is $2.77 billion. Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) last announced its earnings results on Thursday, April 21st. The semiconductor manufacturer reported ($0.12) earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, topping analysts’ consensus estimates of ($0.13) by $0.01. The firm had revenue of $832 million for the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $818.16 million. During the same quarter last year, the business earned ($0.09) EPS. The company’s revenue for the quarter was down 19.2% compared to the same quarter last year. Equities research analysts expect that Advanced Micro Devices will post ($0.28) earnings per share for the current year. Several other equities research analysts have also recently weighed in on AMD. Northland Securities restated an “outperform” rating and issued a $5.00 price objective on shares of Advanced Micro Devices in a research report on Monday, February 29th. Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of Advanced Micro Devices from a “strong sell” rating to a “hold” rating in a research report on Friday. Deutsche Bank restated a “hold” rating and issued a $2.00 price objective on shares of Advanced Micro Devices in a research report on Tuesday, March 22nd. Canaccord Genuity restated a “hold” rating and issued a $2.40 price objective (down previously from $3.50) on shares of Advanced Micro Devices in a research report on Wednesday, January 20th. Finally, Pacific Crest restated an “equal weight” rating on shares of Advanced Micro Devices in a research report on Friday, January 22nd. Seven research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, fifteen have given a hold rating and seven have given a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock has a consensus rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of $2.98. A number of institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of AMD. Creative Planning increased its position in shares of Advanced Micro Devices by 1.4% in the fourth quarter. Creative Planning now owns 153,772 shares of the semiconductor manufacturer’s stock worth $441,000 after buying an additional 2,080 shares during the last quarter. Granite Point Capital Management L.P. purchased a new position in shares of Advanced Micro Devices during the fourth quarter worth $1,148,000. Liberty Mutual Group Asset Management Inc. increased its position in shares of Advanced Micro Devices by 51.8% in the fourth quarter. Liberty Mutual Group Asset Management Inc. now owns 406,787 shares of the semiconductor manufacturer’s stock worth $1,168,000 after buying an additional 138,743 shares during the last quarter. Mutual of America Capital Management LLC increased its position in shares of Advanced Micro Devices by 4.3% in the fourth quarter. Mutual of America Capital Management LLC now owns 440,859 shares of the semiconductor manufacturer’s stock worth $1,265,000 after buying an additional 18,268 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Engineers Gate Manager LP purchased a new position in shares of Advanced Micro Devices during the fourth quarter worth $1,389,000. Advanced Micro Devices, Inc is a global semiconductor company with facilities across the world. The Company offers x86 microprocessors, as standalone devices or as incorporated as an accelerated processing unit ( NASDAQ:AMD ), chipsets, discrete graphics processing units (GPUs) and professional graphics, and server and embedded processors, dense servers, semi-custom System-on-Chip (SoC) products and technology for game consoles. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/04/25/wedbush-reaffirms-hold-rating-for-advanced-micro-devices-inc-amd/ Advanced Micro Devices Inc. Advanced Micro Devices Inc.
